title: [Self-Directed] VR-Based Construction Site Safety Training: Post-Tension Slab Construction Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic construction safety concepts and mathematical engineering analysis skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing Safety Protocol Training and Mathematical Load Calculation Application in High-Risk Construction Work Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify five major risk factors in post-tensioned slab construction with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners achieve a performance accuracy of 85% or higher by reproducing the correct usage procedures of safety equipment through VR training.
Learners can analyze mathematical load distribution simulation results from construction sites and propose three safety improvement measures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
